content.text: I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts! How about you?
I used to sing in a choir, but now I stay at home with my family.
Oh that's so cool! I wish I could sing! What's your favorite kind of music?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into country right now.
Me too! I love country music. I've been going to a lot of concerts lately.
Oh that's so great! I haven't been to a concert in a long time. I miss it!
You should come with me to one of my concerts! I'm sure you'd have a lot of fun.
I would love to! Thanks for the offer!
No problem! I'm glad I could make your day!
Great! I'm glad to hear that!
